name: Tower of Archeos
description: Tower of Archeos is a mix between a roguelike & a puzzlegame with a 8bit retro atmosphere.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: no specific needs Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: As always with Benjamin, a very well crafted game. Too bad that 10 people only will play it. :D
